insights.title: Stale Private Equity Valuation - SaaSCo
insights.description:
Private equity asset 'SaaSCo' has a valuation that is 658 days old, exceeding the 365-day threshold for current valuations.
This stale valuation poses a risk as the asset's true current value may differ significantly, potentially impacting portfolio accuracy and decision-making requiring immediate revaluation.
insights.recommendation: Schedule an immediate valuation update for the SaaSCo private equity position to ensure accurate portfolio reporting and informed decision-making.

insights.title: Liquidity Shortfall for Upcoming Capital Call
insights.description:
A capital call is due on 2025-11-15, but available cash is insufficient, creating a shortfall of $250,000.
This liquidity gap requires immediate action to secure funding, as failure to meet the capital call could result in penalties, loss of investment rights, or forced liquidation of other assets.
insights.recommendation: Immediately secure $250,000 in additional liquidity through asset sales, credit facilities, or other funding sources before the 2025-11-15 deadline.

insights.title: Real Estate Asset Without Active Insurance - Main St Property
insights.description:
Real estate asset 'Main St Property' has inactive insurance status, leaving the property uninsured against potential damages or liabilities.
This exposes the portfolio to significant financial risk from property damage, natural disasters, or liability claims, requiring immediate insurance reinstatement.
insights.recommendation: Immediately contact the insurance provider to reinstate coverage for Main St Property and ensure continuous protection going forward.

summary: Analysis identified 3 key insights requiring attention.
